course_description: An introduction to Riemannian geometry and global analysis. Topics to be covered: Manifolds, Riemannian metrics, Connections, Curvature; Geodesics, Convexity, Topics in Global Analysis.
schedule_location: TTh 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - E406
